*Combine 5 same level Gems, and receive 1 higher level Gem
*Several same type materials can be combined for a higher level material
*Combine X of the same material for a higher level material
*Disenchanting equipment yields the materials used to create it
*Any embedded Gems will automatically be returned to your Bag
*Any equipment on the monster will be automatically returned to your Bag
*If the Coin limit is reached, exceeding Coins will not be collected.
